description: [Versa Director Zero Day Exploitation](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0039) used compromised small office/home office (SOHO) devices to interact with vulnerable Versa Director servers.(Citation: Lumen Versa 2024)

external_references.description: Black Lotus Labs. (2024, August 27). Taking The Crossroads: The Versa Director Zero-Day Exploitaiton. Retrieved August 27, 2024.
